userExperience.exitScreenBodyText: Your Mac has been successfully configured. Below are a few resources to help you get started.
userExperience.exitScreenItem1DescriptionText: Easily install apps and tools provided by your IT department.
userExperience.exitScreenItem2DescriptionText: Everything you need to know to start using your new Mac.
userExperience.exitScreenItem3DescriptionText: Resources and onboarding information for your first day.
userExperience.provisioningBodyText: Your Mac is being automatically configured by your organization. This process may take some time to complete. Please don't attempt to restart or shut down the computer unless you are prompted to do so.
userExperience.welcomeScreenItem1DescriptionText: Multiple settings are being configured, tailored to make your first day exceptional.
userExperience.welcomeScreenItem2DescriptionText: While Apple has world class applications built in to macOS, we know that some of your favorite business applications still need to be added. Some are installing now, but checkout our self service application for even more.
userExperience.welcomeScreenItem3DescriptionText: By applying security policies, we ensure that your device is fully up to date with the latest updates, all while still valuing your privacy.
